name: Hindervines
originalText: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by creatures with no +1/+1 counters on them.

rulings.text: Hindervines checks whether a creature has a +1/+1 counter on it at the moment it deals damage. It doesn’t matter whether a creature had a +1/+1 counter, or was even on the battlefield, when Hindervines resolved.

text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by creatures with no +1/+1 counters on them.
